Node.definition: = state in which humans experience a desire for something to happen, together with a degree of confidence that this desire will be fulfilled through the intervention of someone else; as a result, they are willing to defer taking action for some time
= process by which something or someone is shown to be untrue
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= the part of an object that can be seen with the eye
literally: to be hurled down; hence: = process by which humans suddenly end up prostrate on the ground; ≈ associated with failure
= pertaining to being without mercy towards humans and animals
= causative action by which someone causes someone else's inactivity to end so that he comes into action, ◄ as if he had been sleeping for a certain time

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
literally: to take position; hence: = action by which humans stand firm without fear in the face of danger

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified

= action by which humans meet other humans that are travelling from one location to another ► either with good or with evil intentions; ≈ often extended to describe certain events that happen in people's lives

= the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= action by which someone purposely refrains from responding, either with words or with actions
= state in which an object is an integrated part of a larger unit or substance
= the ability to accomplish great things because of characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
= state in which something is physically attractive, ► which may bring about a favorable attitude in others

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified

= causative action by which someone causes someone else to take off his/her clothes, either entirely or in part, ► as a result of which that person becomes naked or improperly dressed, ≈ which brings shame on that person and to those who stand in a close relation to them
= generic designation for any article of clothing
= state in which an object consists of two layers, ► which enhances its strength

= upper body covering; ◄ made of metal rings joined together to form a flexible unit; ► used by soldiers for protection|= set of ropes or leather straps; ► fitted over the head of a horse and connected to the bit (מֶתֶג) used to steer the horse

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified
= something that provides or prevents access ◄ as if it were a door

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified

= causative action by which humans or deities allow others entrance, passage, or access (in)to a building, construction, or area ◄ by withdrawing a gate, door, window, lid, covering, or other boundary; ≈ sometimes associated with freedom, sometimes with being exposed, vulnerable
= state of strong fear because of an actual or perceived danger, such as aggression from the enemy, a dangerous animal, or death
= state in which humans or deities have an elevated status, either in their own eyes or in the eyes of other people, ≈ which can either be good or bad, depending on whether this status is justified
exact meaning unsure; probably: = quantity of objects arranged in a straight line
= each of the small overlapping horny or bony plates protecting the skin of fish and reptiles, ◄ here compared to a shield because of their protective function
= action of closing or covering over an open space

= engraved object; ◄ made out of metal; ► used to make a mark denoting ownership, approval, or closure of something (normally done by pressing into clay or heated wax and usually attached to a document or letter); sometimes worn on a chain around the neck, or in the form of a ring on one's hand; ≈ regarded as valuable and associated with exclusivity
= state in which an object is relatively small in size, ≈ with the connotation of being too small to be able to do what it is intended for, and with trouble
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
= state in which objects are close to other objects in space

= a natural movement of air, blowing in a particular direction, ranging in intensity from a light breeze to a heavy blast ; ≈ often regarded as the breath of God, but also associated with things that are without substance and cannot be grasped
= the area separating two or mores locations

Node.gloss: a man ... his brother > one ... each other
Node.definition: = expression denoting a situation in which two people or objects that are regarded as masculine are involved in a reciprocal event
= state in which objects are closely compacted together
literally: to capture one another; hence: = process by which two objects are firmly attached to one another

Node.gloss: to be detached|to be disjointed|to be spread out|to be split
Node.definition: = process by which an object is split up into smaller units
= process by which animals make a sudden involuntary expulsion of air through the nose and mouth caused by the irritation of the nostrils
= process by which an object emits or reflects light; ≈ regarded as awesome

= light as a physical phenomenon, mainly observed during daytime, and the opposite of darkness; ◄ one of God's most important attributes; first created by God and since produced by sun, moon, and stars, but also by fire; ► enables people and animals to see; ≈ associated with life, goodness, happiness, prosperity, security, favor, and wisdom, loved by the righteous, and hated by the wicked

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices
literally: eyelids of the dawn; hence: = the earliest beginnings of the new morning
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted
= a burst of brighly glowing light, whose source can be seen (like fire) or invisible (like lightning)
= process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another
= small particle of fire

= state of burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and give out bright light, heat, and smoke; ► used for cooking, melting, cleansing, heating, and destroying; ≈ many aspects of life are compared with fire, such as anger, jealousy, aggression, wickedness, words, life, certain sicknesses, suffering, etc.
= the two external openings of the nose

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= a container ◄ made of iron or ceramics; ► used for boiling food; ≈ associated with steam and smoke
= plant with flexible stems, growing in rivers and marshes; ◄ |iScirpus|i*; ► produces much smoke when burning and used for making ropes; ≈ associated with humility
literally: throat, but with focus on the air flowing through it; hence: = process by which air flows in and out of the body, which shows that a person or animal is alive
= carbonized material resulting from heating wood, ► and used for cooking or warming
= hot glowing body of fire
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= part of the body connecting the rump to the head; ► a ;place to wear ornaments, but also a yoke; ≈ a stiff neck is associated with insolence and pride
= state in which a condition or process takes place for an indefnite amount of time, ◄ as if it lives in that place
= state in which a person, supernatural being, animal, substance, or force has the ability to exert great force
exact meaning unsure; possibly: = to move with speed and great strides
= state in which people and animals have lost their inner strength and courage
= the soft substance in the body of humans and animals that consists of muscle tissue and fat
= state in which objects are closely compacted together
= process by which different objects stick together and form a single unit, ◄ as if it were cast in a mould
= particle marking a proposition as not true
= state in which an object is not firmly fixed to the surface on which it stands so that it can move or slip; to waver

= the organ located in the centre of the human body that pumps the blood through our circulatory system, ≈ seen as the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= state in which humans and animals are not easily frightened, an attitude which is said to reside in the heart (לֵב)

Node.gloss: to be hard as stone (of one's heart) > to not be easily frightened
Node.definition: literally: (one's) heart is hard as stone; hence: = state of not being easily frightened
= state in which humans and animals are not easily frightened, an attitude which is said to reside in the heart (לֵב)

= one of two stones ► that are used to grind grain into flour; the grain was placed on the stationary bottom stone, and the top stone was pressed down on top of the grain and scraped back and forth; ≈ associated with hardness
= action by which an animal raises itself from a lying position
= state in which humans experience a strong fear of other humans, deities, or animals
= person who has a position of leadership|= generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= action by which a human being moves in a backward direction

literally: to overtake; hence: = process by which events that humans have been expecting or dreading finally take place, ◄ as if they had been pursuing them for some time and ultimately caught up with them
= offensive weapon consisting of long blade for cutting or thrusting or both, and hilt with hand guard; ◄ made out of iron; ► used in warfare; ≈ symbol of aggression and punishment
= particle marking a proposition as not true
= a long, straight rod, usually made of wood, with a sharp iron (בַּרְזֶל) head or point; used for piercing by thrusting; its length varied from the height of a man to much longer
exact meaning uncertain; probably = a small hand held weapon, sharpened to a point on one end, and thrown

meaning unsure; possibly: = a type of short spear (רֹמַח) or large arrow (חֵץ) made of wood or reed, and therefore relatively light and more suited for throwing from a standing position or while riding on a horse or in a chariot
= to hold the opinion that a particular object, person, or event is to be identified with, considered similar to, or to be equated with another object, person, or event
= dried stalks of grain and grasses, usually left over from harvesting grain ► used as food for animals or as an ingredient for making clay bricks; ≈ associated with something of little value
= a strong, hard magnetic silvery grey metal, ► used in construction and manufacturing; ≈ associated with strength and permanence
= a single piece of wood taken from a tree, cut and finished, and used for building and construction
= a yellowish brown alloy of copper with up to one third tin, ≈ regarded as a hard and difficult to bend

Node.gloss: to put to flight|to chase away
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans cause other humans or animals to move to another place in haste, ◄ usually by threatening them with violence
= member of a larger group of related people or objects, ◄ referred to as a child of that larger group
literally son of the bow; hence: = pointed missile, shot from a bow; slender and straight in shape and moving swiftly; ◄ made out of wood and/or iron; ► mainly used for hunting and in warfare

= dry grass like remnant of wheat or another grain crop following the harvest; this term possibly refers to two kinds of material, one being the remnant of the crop remaining in the ground, the other being the unwanted residue of stalks; ► only used for brick making; ≈ usually considered of little value and needing to be separated from the grain itself; maybe burned
= process by which humans, deities, or objects take on a different nature, character, or form

= an object ◄ of stone, ► usually found in nature and used for throwing, building crude constructions; stones with a particular shape are sometimes used as a memorial or religious symbol; ≈ regarded as extremely common, easily available, but also as strong, hard, and unflexible

= weapon consisting of two strings with a pouch (כַּף) in the middle;◄ made of leather; ► a stone (אֶבֶן) is placed in the pouch, the sling is twirled and one string released to propel the stone; used to hunt or to chase away wild animals, or to attack an enemy

= dry grass like remnant of wheat or another grain crop following the harvest; this term possibly refers to two kinds of material, one being the remnant of the crop remaining in the ground, the other being the unwanted residue of stalks; ► only used for brick making; ≈ usually considered of little value and needing to be separated from the grain itself; maybe burned
= to hold the opinion that a particular object, person, or event is to be identified with, considered similar to, or to be equated with another object, person, or event
= a short wooden rod used for hunting

Node.gloss: to laugh at|to be confident in the face of
Node.definition: literally: to laugh (at something); hence: = state in which humans or animals have no fear for a certain situation

= a type of short spear (רֹמַח) or large arrow (חֵץ) made of wood or reed, and therefore relatively light and more suited for throwing from a standing position or while riding on a horse or in a chariot
= sharp pieces of broken pottery

= piece of baked clay; often with sharp, jagged edges; ◄ part of a broken earthenware vessel; ► can be used for activities like scooping water, carrying hot coals, scraping oneself, and wounding oneself in order to express one's sorrow; ≈ symbol of dryness

= wooden board with sharp stones or pieces of iron tightly wedged into small holes; ► dragged over harvested grain with the help of a draft animal to separate grain from straw or husk; ≈ symbol of power and aggression

= wet soil;◄ moistened by rain or because of its proximity to a body of water; ► can be used for pottery or bricks; ≈ regarded as cheap, easily obtainable and workable material for making basic items; otherwise as a valueless substance or an obstacle for movement
= causative action by which a large animal causes water to start bubbling as if it is boiling
= a rounded container ◄ usually made of ceramic or metal ► used for storage or cooking
= a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water
= causative action by which humans or deities make objects or (other) humans different from what they were before
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is located or takes place behind Y

Node.gloss: to cause to shine|to give light to|to light up|radiant|resplendent
Node.definition: = action that causes something to emit or to reflect light; ≈ associated with well being and wisdom
= to hold the opinion that a particular object, person, or event is to be identified with, considered similar to, or to be equated with another object, person, or event

= great body of water located around and under the surface of the earth; when the world was newly created this water used to cover the earth as well; the subterranean water comes up to the surface of the earth through springs

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= the loose natural substance of the earth's surface
= causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them
= particle marking a proposition as not true
= state of lacking inner strength and courage

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= state in which a person or object is of great or more than average height; ≈ associated with status

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= state of being associated with a certain attribute, attitude, or behavior, ◄ referred to as a child of that attribute, attitude, or behavior
